reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft and comfortable, with high-quality construction and a flattering fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy Comfort at Its Best!
items.body: I absolutely adore this Women's Oversized Crewneck Sweater! From the moment I slipped it on, I knew it was going to be a staple in my wardrobe. The batwing design adds a stylish flair, while the ribbed knit texture gives it a cozy feel. The side slits provide a trendy touch and make it easy to layer over any outfit. Whether I'm lounging at home or heading out for a casual outing, this sweater keeps me warm and stylish. The quality is exceptional, and it washes well without losing its shape or softness. I've received so many compliments every time I wear it. If you're looking for the perfect oversized sweater, look no further! Read more
items.author: Alyce Silva

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs really large. Feels wonderful color was exceptional.
items.body: This sweater feels amazing. It runs really - really big. Great Quality! Sadly, I had to send it back because it was just too big. Read more
items.author: Suburban mom

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Comfy but Very Oversized
items.body: This Oversized Crewneck Sweater is incredibly soft and cozy — perfect for lounging or creating that relaxed, casual look. The knit is nice and thick, and the ribbed texture adds a stylish touch. I love the batwing sleeves and side slits, which give it a laid-back, effortlessly cool vibe. Just be aware — it is very oversized. Even knowing it was supposed to be loose, it was still bigger than I expected. If you’re between sizes or prefer a slightly more fitted look, you might want to size down. That said, it’s great for layering and super comfortable — I’ve worn it with leggings, jeans, even over a dress. I’m giving it 4 stars only because of how dramatically oversized it is, but overall it’s a great, cozy sweater for cooler days! Read more
items.author: JB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy!
items.body: I’m 5’6, 140, bought size medium, it’s not crazy oversized but it fits bigger. Very comfy, soft, great for a cold day, pairs great with yoga pants. I thought it might be what I would call a “boxy” fit because of the stripes but it’s tailored well much because of the sleeves. I like it! Wash in cold, hang dry, low heat iron if necessary. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars “Apricot Stripe” is definitely just tan
items.body: It’s soft and stretchy and comfy, the side slits make it a flattering fit (I would say it’s not really an oversized fit just tts), but returning due to inaccurate color description. I ordered “apricot stripe”, the image made the color look off-white. It arrived and it’s most definitely tan. Not flattering against my skin and hair color. Bummed cause it’s a cute sweater, just not my color. [Pic is it on my *white* barstool for reference] Read more
items.author: Erin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfection!
items.body: Absolutely love this! Its so soft, its not thin material and I receive compliments when I wear it. I pair it with a khaki vest and its perfect! I am wearing a small Read more
items.author: Stephanie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing!
items.body: So cute! Amazing quality. Oversized fit just like the picture shows. Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE This Sweater!
items.body: LOVE this sweater! Great quality, no pilling. It's flattering, sized well and cozy. I get so many compliments on it. Read more
items.author: Stacey Larson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Apricot Stripe, Plaidgrey, Mixblack, Mixgreen, Colorfullightcarmel, Contrastgreen, Mixcoffee, Print, Stripecolorful, Green Stripe, Off-white, Orangeyellow, Mixcaramel, Plaidgreen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
